posts.title: Launching the Tal3nt Knowledge Base
posts.excerpt: We consolidated protocol specs, community playbooks, and contributor journeys into a single GitBook-inspired surface.
posts.author: Tal3nt Core Team
posts.content:
## Why ship docs now?
Teams rely on Tal3nt to run bounty programs, so they need a reliable reference.

## What you can expect
- Guided onboarding paths for founders, operators, and contributors.
- Embedded snippets pulled directly from the live escrow contracts.
- A changelog that mirrors protocol releases.

## What comes next
We are shipping a `/sync` CLI so you can mirror this data into your internal wikis.

posts.content:
